name: Moneygrabber
summary:
You gotta MAKE money to SPEND money! Moneygrabber is an easy to pick up, endless arcade game in which you grab money. All money that is grabbed can be spent on status symbols. Some status symbols enhances your grabbing capabilities, while others are just for show. The game is based around a likeable avatar that you can dress up, and who reacts humorously to your grabbing.

Make money, spend money, make money. Moneygrabber is a tongue in cheek simulation of life.
